dt: {bc}of, relating to, or characteristic of {d_link|Draco|Draco:b} or the severe code of laws held to have been framed by him

et: Latin {it}Dracon-, Draco{/it}, from Greek {it}Drakōn{/it} Draco (Athenian lawgiver)
shortdef: of, relating to, or characteristic of Draco or the severe code of laws held to have been framed by him
